mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysDynmcConfigDetail Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MALL_ID , CONFIG_NM , CONFIG_BEG_DT , CONFIG_KEY , CONFIG_VAL , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_DYNMC_CONFIG_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_ID = #{mallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CONFIG_NM = #{configNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CONFIG_BEG_DT = #{configBegDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND CONFIG_KEY = #{configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
